ARABIC: وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٌ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There was no group to come to his aid, besides Allah, and he was not given any help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He had no body to help him other than God, nor was he able to save himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And there was no host, beside Allah, to help him, nor could he be of any help to himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He had no one besides God to help him, nor could he himself achieve any success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And he had no group to help him against Allah, nor was he capable of taking revenge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he had no group of men to help him against Allah, nor could he defend (or save) himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he had no host to help him besides Allah nor could he defend himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But there was no host to help him, apart from God, and he was helpless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he had no troop of men to help him as against Allah, nor could he save himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He had no party to help him against God, nor was he able to defend himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there could be no party suceouring him as against Allah, nor could he himself be an avenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He had no party to help him, besides Allah, nor could he help himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor had he numbers to help him against Allah, nor was he able to deliver himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he had no group of men to help him against Allah, nor could he defend or save himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He had no host to help him besides Allah, and he was helpless
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He had no faction to help him besides God, and he was helpless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:43] But there was no (read takun or yakun) party, [no] persons, to help him, besides God, at the moment of its destruction, nor could he help himself, at the moment of its destruction, [all by] himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he had no troop of men to help him as against Allah) i.e. against Allah's punishment, (nor could he save himself) from Allah's punishment.
